Sentencas: Ionic conductivity enables the technologies of fuel cells, electrolysis cells, and batteries.
Titulo: Field Effect Conductivities of P-I-N Heterostructure Films in Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, the ambiguous origins of the extraordinary ionic conductivity impede its implementation in heterostructure films for the devices.
Titulo: Field Effect Conductivities of P-I-N Heterostructure Films in Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Here, we disclosed that the extraordinary ionic and electronic conductivities come from field effect.
Titulo: Field Effect Conductivities of P-I-N Heterostructure Films in Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We found in Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta (CGO)/ Zr0.85Y0.15O2-delta (YSZ) heterostructures that the ionic conductivity of CGO layer (n-i conductor) and the electronic conductivity of YSZ layer (p-i conductor) exponentially increased with potential.
Titulo: Field Effect Conductivities of P-I-N Heterostructure Films in Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The potential occurred from electron transfer and stoichiometric polarization in p-i-n junction.
Titulo: Field Effect Conductivities of P-I-N Heterostructure Films in Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Field effect ionic conductivity contributed the major increment in the maximum power density.
Titulo: Field Effect Conductivities of P-I-N Heterostructure Films in Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrated field effect ionic and electronic conductivities, their dependences on heterostructures, and impacts on fuel cells.
Titulo: Field Effect Conductivities of P-I-N Heterostructure Films in Fuel Cells
